data.description:
This is a DEMO including two exercise

VR Fencing Trainer Combines a Virtual or Real Eppie Rapier and Saber with Virtual Exercises

A game complex of exercises aimed at reaction and attention. The athlete learns and practice to attack and defend with sets of challenges.

Muscle memory and motor skills are formed through practice and repetition of exercises in VR with a real or virtual blade

changelog.change_log:
General changes (major):

 Updated shader system.

 Added new player weapon behavior - physical

 Redesigned mannequins and their physical models (used in 4 workouts)

 The physics in the project has been changed, all workouts have been optimized for the new physics

 Changed the behavior of physical buttons, removed a critical bug

 Created a new control - slider

 An external tool for creating and editing rhythm training maps has been created

 A flexible system for loading cards for rhythm training has been created.

 Added many new animations

  

  General changes (minor):

 New lighting

 Redesigned records storage system

 Added new add-ons over the UI (scrolling titles, changed progress bars and other small UX)

 Added popups when hitting points.

 Many workouts have new UIs that inform the user about accuracy, speed, etc.

 Added the ability to move elements in some workouts

  

  Workout updates:

     -Target

 Changed (rewritten from scratch) difficulty system

 Changed (rewritten from scratch) scoring and hit registration system

 Changes in the gameplay and difficulty system of this workout.

 Added the ability to adjust the position of the target by the player
  
        

     -Protection 6

 Fixed critical lag at work

 Changes in the leaderboard storage system in this particular workout
 
    

     -Mannequin (favero)

 Changed (rewritten from scratch) scoring system

 Gameplay changes in training (no timer now + other minor changes)

 Added the ability to adjust the height of the target to the player

  

  -Animations

  Added workout

  Added a new entity - points on the mannequin and areas on the blade

  Added new timer

          

  -Fight with trainer:

  AI base skeleton created

  A system for predicting player strikes has been created

  A system has been created that determines the possibility of an attack (currently not implemented)

  A flexible system for moving and keeping a distance has been created

  Created preliminary movement and dodge animations

  

  -Fruit Ninja

  Created tracks and maps for them

  Changed (rewritten from scratch) spawn system

  Changed (rewritten from scratch) difficulty system

  Changed (rewritten from scratch) scoring system

  Added a system that tells the player in advance where the target will be (light cones with procedural animation, volumetrics).

  Changed (rewritten from scratch) the code of cannons that shoot fruit. Now the system calculates the speed for a shot to a certain height indicated in the map.

      

     -Bit Saber:

  Created tracks and maps for them

  Changed (rewritten from scratch) difficulty system

  Changed (rewritten from scratch) scoring system

  Created track selection system with new UI

New:
-New mannequin model
-Updated mannequin train, every weapon now have custom points set
-Added fun weapon trail
-New balls models in balls train
-Updated to new shaders with more features and optimisation
-Train system updated to handle more trains with unique challenges

Fixed:
-Balls train points calculation 
-Mannequin feet positions
-changes to privacy policy.

New: 
-added Spanish
-included 90Hz 
-MSAA x4 anti-aliasing enabled 
-Resolution raised to 1440x1584  

Fixes:
-fixed German language 
-fixed switching of the epee attachment in the settings
-fixed left-handed mode
-fixed the sky outside the window 
-fixed the controllers in the menu
